doc.field: Order Reprint of this Story November 23 2017 08 00 AM The first Carrousel Parade was held in 1947 and the Observer reported in 1950 that a half million people came out. (Here s a look at the 1954 parade). Now called the Novant Health Thanksgiving Day Parade thousands still line up to see marching bands beauty queens and Santa! I hope you enjoy the slideshow and that everyone has a nice Thanksgiving! Never miss a local story. Sign up today for a free 30 day free trial of unlimited digital access.
